songs.lyrics:
The spheres in motion
Wrapped around collapsing star
Immortal hands and eyes a frame
On fearful scars

The mistery of living,
Breating dying hard
My name and occupation
Tattoed on my face

The stars my destiny deep space my dwelling place

Hard bony limbs covered in leathered skin
Behind his eyes with the rage of ten warped men
Without a sound he steals right through the night
The sign of death to him brings grim delight

Those marked for death can feel him coming near
Some stand in fight and some just cry in fear
On a horse black, the dark lord takes to flight
But no one forgets the Highlander rode tonight

(x2)
Can't you hear his call
The Mightiest will fall
He will control your destiny
Many mortal screams out of agony
The Highlander has come for me

(approx)
We all see him kneel, after the ... ... fathers
Those who died on the field of battle, ... (grunt/shout)
Yes slay 500 noble men and did not need to many, no (NO!)
(approx)

There's no white spell to best this Earth Pig born
Against his kind an eternal oath was sworn
All kinds of men will fall beneath his blade
Women and children, the choice it has been made

You see him fighting across the field
Some Stand and fight and some just cry in fear
On a horse black, the dark lord takes to flight
But no one forgets the Highlander rode tonight

Down and out on the Solomani Rim
Now the spinward marches don't look so grim

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run

I'm mercenary, live in hyper-drive
Traders and Gunboats keeping me alive

On route to Pscias always on the run
Busted in the Sword-Worlds with a loaded Gauss-Gun

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run

(approx)
The Sword-Worlds are a loose confederation of worlds
all colonised in the same era

Through the centuries their relationship has varied from 
fledgeling empires to scattered trading packs

At the spinward edge 120 parsecs
from the original center of the Empirium

The Martians represent one of the furthest
extensive exploration in the Zodani consulate and Vargr extents
(approx)

Down and out on the Solomani Rim
Now the spinward marches don't look so grim

On route to Pscias always on the run
Busted in the Sword-Worlds with a loaded Gauss-Gun (Gauss-Gun)

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run
